steps.325: place-place avocado slices on each leaf
steps.326: Season-season 1/4 tsp pepper on the bowl
steps.327: Add-1/4 cup mayonnaise to the bowl
steps.331: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl
steps.332: top-top lettuce leaves with the tuna mixture
steps.333: Add-add chopped scallion to the bowl
steps.334: Add-Add 1 can drained tuna to the bowl
steps.337: secure-secure the wrap with a toothpick
steps.339: Add-1 tsp Sriracha sauce to the bowl
